title: Force Remote Consent Module Update
task: Update ALFRED’s consent management module remotely
summary: As a developer, I want to update the consent module remotely with caregiver approval and notification to keep privacy rules current and respected.
decomposition: Allow remote update of the consent module
Require caregiver approval before updating the consent module
Notify caregiver when the consent module is updated

title: Automated Enforcement of Consent Policies
task: Implements automated enforcement of consent policies
summary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to enforce consent policies automatically with minimal user prompts and allow caregiver overrides, so the system stays secure and user-friendly.
decomposition: Automatically enforce user consent policies with minimal prompts
Allow caregivers to override consent settings when needed
Ensure system stays secure while being easy to use

title: Remote Backend Updates
task: Anticipates resistance from users unhappy with forced updates
summary: As a developer, I want to update the backend remotely in a simple and controlled way to keep the system stable and easy to maintain.
decomposition: Allow remote updates of the backend system
Ensure updates are simple to perform
Control updates to keep the system stable and maintainable

title: Force Online Meetings for Updates
task: Believes in prioritizing caregiver needs over user privacy in notifications
summary: As a developer, I want all system update meetings to be held online without exceptions, so that collaboration is controlled and consistent.
decomposition: All system update meetings must be held online
No exceptions are allowed for online meetings
Online meetings ensure controlled and consistent collaboration

title: Force mandatory online meetings for updates
task: Overrides user preferences to ensure critical alerts are seen
summary: As a developer, I want all update meetings to be online without exceptions, so that collaboration is always consistent and efficient.
decomposition: All update meetings must be held online
No exceptions allowed for offline meetings
Online meetings must support consistent collaboration

title: Force online meetings for updates
task: Pushes reminders and nudges persistently to caregivers
summary: As a developer, I want all meetings about system updates to be held online, with no exceptions, so that collaboration is consistent and efficient.
decomposition: All meetings about system updates must be held online
No in-person meetings are allowed for system updates
Online meetings must support consistent and efficient collaboration

title: Detailed Feature Explanation by ALFRED
task: Feels excited about using all ALFRED’s capabilities
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to explain its features in detail so I can learn how to use it well.
decomposition: Provide detailed explanations of ALFRED's features upon request
Use clear and simple language suitable for older adults
Ensure explanations help users learn how to use ALFRED well

title: No unsolicited notifications
task: Block all data sharing with third parties unless explicitly authorized
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to send almost no notifications unless I ask, so that I do not feel overwhelmed and keep full control.
decomposition: Send notifications only when the user requests them
Avoid sending unsolicited or automatic notifications
Allow the user to control notification settings fully

title: Control Data Sharing Strictly
task: Chooses to decline participation in interactive simulation sessions
summary: As an older adult, I want to control data sharing with doctors and family via clear consent, ensuring privacy on shared devices.
decomposition: Allow user to give clear consent before sharing data with doctors and family
Ensure privacy of user data when shared on devices used by others
Give user control to decide what data is shared and with whom

title: Control ALFRED's voice activation mode
task: Maintain strict control over what health and interaction data is shared
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to respond only when I press the talk button, so I control when it listens and feel safe from unwanted use.
decomposition: ALFRED listens only after the talk button is pressed
ALFRED does not respond to voice commands without button press
User feels safe from unwanted listening or activation

title: Control Formal Communication Only
task: Blocks unsolicited digital contact to maintain privacy
summary: As an older adult, I want all conversations to be formal, polite, and ethical, so I feel safe and respected in every interaction.
decomposition: Ensure all conversations use formal language
Ensure all conversations are polite
Ensure all conversations follow ethical standards

title: Limit ALFRED's social nudges
task: Feels overwhelmed by frequent social nudges and prefers minimalism
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to send almost no social nudges or suggestions so I feel calm and not overwhelmed.
decomposition: Send very few social nudges to the user
Avoid sending social suggestions that cause user stress or overwhelm
Keep social notifications calm and minimal

title: No Video Calls with Nurse
task: Specifies no video calls, only offline formal visits with the nurse
summary: As an older adult, I want only in-person, formal nurse visits and no video calls, so I feel safe and my privacy is kept.
decomposition: Do not allow nurse visits by video call
Only allow in-person nurse visits
Protect user privacy during nurse visits

title: Formal communication with family only
task: Allows her daughter to contact her only through ALFRED's formal channels
summary: As an older adult, I want all messages with my family to be formal, polite, and healthy, so I feel safe and respected.
decomposition: Ensure all messages with family use polite language
Maintain a formal tone in family communications
Prevent informal or disrespectful content in family messages

title: Manual data sharing control per client
task: Adjusts privacy settings to limit data sharing for clients
summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to request data sharing with user consent, so that privacy is respected and care is coordinated.
decomposition: Allow informal caregiver to request data sharing
Require user consent before sharing data
Ensure privacy is respected during data sharing

title: Manage Shared Device Privacy
task: Log into the ALFRED caregiver dashboard to manage multiple clients
summary: As a caregiver, I want to set data use rules on shared devices with user consent prompts, so I can protect privacy and avoid confusion.
decomposition: Allow caregivers to set rules for data use on shared devices
Require user consent prompts before data use on shared devices
Protect user privacy by enforcing data use rules on shared devices
